actions.description: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Rend

languages: understands Draconic and Common but can't speak
name: Dragonnel

specialTraits.description: The dragonnel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
specialTraits.name: Flyby
